name: Limit
natural_language_description: 这是 Limit 节点。主要用于: Restrict the number of items

maxItems.name: maxItems
maxItems.description: If there are more items than this number, some are removed
maxItems.natural_language_description: 参数名: Max Items | 作用: If there are more items than this number, some are removed | 默认值: 1

keep.name: keep
keep.description: When removing items, whether to keep the ones at the start or the ending
keep.natural_language_description: 参数名: Keep | 作用: When removing items, whether to keep the ones at the start or the ending | 默认值: firstItems
